testcase.name: runScenario["Verify login functionality with correct username and correct password", "Login"](1)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Verify login functionality with correct username and correct password # src/test/java/Feature/Login.feature:9 When User navigated to website # Steps.MyStepdefs.userNavigatedToWebsite() And Fill his correct "standard_user" and correct "secret_sauce" # Steps.MyStepdefs.fillHisCorrectAndCorrect(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then User should be able to see Homepage of the application. # Steps.MyStepdefs.userShouldBeAbleToSeeHomepageOfTheApplication()

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify login functionality with incorrect username and correct password", "Login"](2)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Verify login functionality with incorrect username and correct password # src/test/java/Feature/Login.feature:17 When User navigated to website # Steps.MyStepdefs.userNavigatedToWebsite() And Fill his correct "standard_use" and correct "secret_sauce" # Steps.MyStepdefs.fillHisCorrectAndCorrect(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then an error should appear in front of user # Steps.Login.anErrorShouldAppearInFrontOfUser()

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify login functionality with incorrect username and incorrect password", "Login"](3)

testcase.name: runScenario["Check that user is able to order an product from the application", "Check order functionality"](5)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Check that user is able to order an product from the application # src/test/java/Feature/Order.feature:10 When User navigated to website # Steps.MyStepdefs.userNavigatedToWebsite() And Fill his correct "standard_user" and correct "secret_sauce" # Steps.MyStepdefs.fillHisCorrectAndCorrect(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And selects his product which he want to order # Steps.Order.selectsHisProductWhichHeWantToOrder() Then user will be able to order his product after filling his delivery information # Steps.Order.userWillBeAbleToOrderHisProductAfterFillingHisDeliveryInformation()

testcase.name: runScenario["check that user is able to make a successful order for multiple selected products", "Check order functionality"](6)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: check that user is able to make a successful order for multiple selected products # src/test/java/Feature/Order.feature:20 When User navigated to website # Steps.MyStepdefs.userNavigatedToWebsite() And Fill his correct "standard_user" and correct "secret_sauce" # Steps.MyStepdefs.fillHisCorrectAndCorrect(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And selects his products which he want to order # Steps.MultiOrder.selectsHisProductsWhichHeWantTooOrder() Then user will be able to order his product after filling his delivery information # Steps.Order.userWillBeAbleToOrderHisProductAfterFillingHisDeliveryInformation()

testcase.name: runScenario["Check that user is able to get an error when user didn't provide firstname under delivery information page", "Check order functionality"](7)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Check that user is able to get an error when user didn't provide firstname under delivery information page # src/test/java/Feature/Order.feature:29 When User navigated to website # Steps.MyStepdefs.userNavigatedToWebsite() And Fill his correct "standard_user" and correct "secret_sauce" # Steps.MyStepdefs.fillHisCorrectAndCorrect(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And selects his product which he want to order # Steps.Order.selectsHisProductWhichHeWantToOrder() Then user should be able to an error if don't provide any firstname under delivery information page # Steps.InformationPage.userShouldBeAbleToAnErrorIfDonProvideAnyFirstnameUnderDeliveryInformationPage()

testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Check that user is able to get an error when user didn't provide lastname under delivery information page # src/test/java/Feature/Order.feature:38 When User navigated to website # Steps.MyStepdefs.userNavigatedToWebsite() And Fill his correct "standard_user" and correct "secret_sauce" # Steps.MyStepdefs.fillHisCorrectAndCorrect(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And selects his product which he want to order # Steps.Order.selectsHisProductWhichHeWantToOrder() Then user should be able to an error if don't provide any lastname under delivery information page # Steps.InformationPage.userShouldBeAbleToAnErrorIfDonTProvideAnyLastnameUnderDeliveryInformationPage()
